protein.general_function: Involved in ARF GTPase activator activity
protein.specific_function: GTPase-activating protein (GAP) for ADP ribosylation factor 1 (ARF1). Implicated in coatomer-mediated protein transport between the Golgi complex and the endoplasmic reticulum. Hydrolysis of ARF1-bound GTP may lead to dissociation of coatomer from Golgi-derived membranes to allow fusion with target membranes

go_class.description: regulation of nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
regulation of purine nucleotide catabolic process
